entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Apparently this is deeper than just a single missing person. Slavery on Tatooine is a horrible truth, but here on Corellia? It's best to stamp this horror out early before it has a chance to grow.
entries.journal_entry_description: Madison seems to think Kyran's friend Bandor might have some information about his whereabouts. Go talk to this person and see if they can shed any light on Kyran's absence.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Madison has sent you to talk to her husband's friend Bandor to see if he might know where Kyran could be.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Bandor won't talk to you unless you stop someone from leaning on him.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You found a datapad on Faye's corpse. See if it adds any information to this investigation.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Faye's datapad has several entries describing "marks" she seduced one way or another and drugged.  Once they were drugged, she sold them to a slave ring operating near Tyrena.  One entry even marks how she sold one Rodian into slavery after finding out where his family lived, then breaking in and kidnapping his wife and daughter to sell them as well.  Her final entries refer to getting tired of Bandor and selling him off next. Bandor should be more than willing to give up his information now.
entries.task03_message_box_text: Faye's datapad has several entries describing "marks" she seduced one way or another and drugged.  Once they were drugged, she sold them to a slave ring operating near Tyrena.  One entry even marks how she sold one Rodian into slavery after finding out where his family lived, then breaking in and kidnapping his wife and daughter to sell them as well.  Her final entries refer to getting tired of Bandor and selling him off next. Bandor should be more than willing to give up his information now.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: It looks like Bandor is a part of this mess. There is nothing definitive, but Bandor might have had something to do with Kyran's disappearance.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Bandor said you can find Kyran in a camp just outside Tyrena, along with some others. What Kyran is doing at this camp, or who these 'others' are wasn't specified. Perhaps you should go see for yourself.
